# When Stars Align
## Scripture
"For the Lord your God is God of gods and Lord of lords, the great God, mighty and awesome, who shows no partiality and accepts no bribes." - Deuteronomy 10:17

## Reflection
As we gaze up at the night sky, we notice the alignment of stars, planets, and constellations. This celestial harmony is a reflection of God's sovereignty over all creation. The precision and intricacy of the universe's design point to a powerful and awesome God who is in control. Just as the alignment of stars can signal significant events or seasons, our lives are also marked by periods of alignment with God's plan. When we surrender to His will, our paths become intertwined with His purpose, and we experience a sense of harmony and direction.

## Prayer
Dear Heavenly Father, we marvel at the majesty of Your creation, especially the celestial bodies that align in the night sky. Help us to recognize the harmony that exists when our lives are aligned with Your purpose. Grant us the wisdom to surrender to Your will and the courage to trust in Your sovereignty. As we navigate the seasons of life, may we remain attentive to Your voice, guiding us toward the fulfillment of Your plan. May our lives reflect the beauty and wonder of the stars, shining brightly for Your glory. Amen.
